design_description: DNA from tumor snap frozen or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue to be analyzed for somatic variants and buffy coat or distant normal tissue to be used to eliminate germline variants were made into libraries using Agilent SureSelect XT target enrichment system custom panels.  The libraries were then pooled and sequenced on Illumina 2000/2500, 4000, or NextSeq500 sequencers.

DNA from tumor snap frozen or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue to be analyzed for somatic variants and buffy coat or distant normal tissue to be used to eliminate germline variants were made into libraries using Agilent SureSelect XT target enrichment system custom panels.  The libraries were then pooled and sequenced on Illumina 2000/2500, 4000, or NextSeq500 sequencers.

DNA from tumor snap frozen or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue to be analyzed for somatic variants and buffy coat or distant normal tissue to be used to eliminate germline variants were made into libraries using Agilent SureSelect XT target enrichment system custom panels.  The libraries were then pooled and sequenced on Illumina 2000/2500, 4000, or NextSeq500 sequencers.
